known_issues: Actor not available to start error encountered during deployment/startup

existing_features.title: Fix the 'actor not available to start' error by ensuring the backend actor is properly initialized before any frontend queries or mutations attempt to use it. Add a guard in the actor access layer that waits for the actor to be ready before allowing calls, and surfaces a meaningful loading or error state to the user if the actor is unavailable.

projectName: Fix actor not available to start error
